title: Sketchbook, "(2) Line of 'Lines' in Line (4) making much nonsense & such and as such; much", started November 13, 1998–finished March 28, 1999
title_raw: "(2) Line of 'Lines' in Line (4) making much nonsense & such and as such; much"
medium: ball point pen and black, red, green, and blue inks, graphite on paper
signed: Signed and dated in graphite, front end-paper, upper right corner: Edward Fella 98; back end-paper, lower right corner: March 28/Edward Fella 99
inscribed: In graphite, on cover-page:  a Sketch Book of 95 pages/EDW FELLA/1998-99[note:-99 is in green ink]/title: "(2) Line up 'Lines' in Line (4) making/much nonsense & such/and as/such; much"/[arrow pointing right] start on Nov. 13[circled, with written "a friday" above]/[arrow pointing right] finished MARCH 28[circled] 1999/Ball Pt. Pen Bic 4 colors/[lines of black, red,  green, blue adjacent to "lead/w /pencil/ sometimes"/EDWARD FELLA/25682 ALMENDRA DRIVE/VALENCIA CALIFORNIA 91355/CAL ARTS/27400 McBEAN PKWY/VALENCIA CA 91355/661-255-1050 X 2621/FAX 661-259-5871/E- Ed fella@AOL.com. (one of these days)"
dimensions: Notebook page size: 20.2 x 11.9 cm (7 15/16 x 4 11/16 in.)
description: Blue hardbound sketchbook containing 96 lined leaves. First leaf used as cover-page; the following leaves are numbered 1-95. On each recto: colored ink word and picture drawings; on each verso, poems (in graphite) refer to image on facing page. Playful, experimental lettering/word images complement the word play of the corresponding poem. On verso of front end paper:  four Chinese cookie fortunes are glued.

tombstone.epitaph: Sketchbook, "(2) Line of 'Lines' in Line (4) making much nonsense & such and as such; much", started November 13, 1998–finished March 28, 1999. ball point pen and black, red, green, and blue inks, graphite on paper. Gift of Edward Fella. 2001-23-1.
